titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of a Borrower's Card: Teissier

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: s2: Corrected "1837" to "1937" s3: Changed " Means" to "Ends + Means" s4: Changed " Years" to "Unforgotten Years" s7: Changed "Hurley" to "Huxley" Corrected "Renwed" to "Renewed" Corrected "Hornboot" to "Hornbook" s8: Corrected "sold to Bey" to "sold to Beg" s9: Corrected "Mermaie" to "Mermaid"

div.head: TEISSIER II Dec. Tiessier TEISSIER
div.ab: Febr. 11 Movies for the Millions. Febr. 15
div.note: (May 13 1936 seems to be last time subsc paid 1 yr 2 vols, new books) 500v

March 18 1938 paid 100v on account for 1 yr 1 old 1 new vol subscription from May 13 1937 To Dec 31 1937 180 frs Jan 1st 1938 - Jan 1st 1939500 Renewed (1 new 1 old book 680 March 25 paid 100 by cheque April 5 balance 580

div.head: DUPLICATE CARD DELPECH. Invalides 37-75 1937. 9 Ave de la Bourdonnais 19 ave Emile Dechanel
div.note: owes. 158. for Esquire paid June 18 1937
div.ab: 29. B. Shaw (Writers of The day) July 9
July 9. Gone with the wind. July 16.
26 Great Laughter Sept 3. 27 sent p.c. closing
div.note: leaving for America
2 new + old paid 680v Oct 17 paid 100v
April 29 sent Of Mice & Men 20 Serenade 67 50 The Postman Rings Twice 20 107,50 subscription Life ($10) 330,00 (357 437 50 extras April 28 14 Total 451 50 paid by M. Teissier May 11th
(dollar 35.70 - not 33 paid 330 357 so balance due 27.00) 330 bal.due 27

bibl.title: I Live Under a Black Sun
Life & Death of a Spanish Town

div.note: will pay subrc next time: 612v Renewed Jan 1st 1939 - Jan 1st 1940 2 s B 600v

div.head: VI
div.note: (owes March 13 To Beg I am Ashamed 60)

ab.bibl: Poe's Works Lippincott ed vols II, IV

div.note: owes 60 francs see Mar 13 paid june 26th
div.ab: June 12 Grapes of Wrath save for Mrs Culvert June 21

div.head: 1939 TEISSIER subrc to Jan 1st 1940 Madame R. Sunny Hill Allée St Clair La Boule Loire Inf
div.ab: Nov 16 Death without Honour ret. by Mme D.E. Dec 21
div.note: (after Many a Summer, Huxley Nov 16 Mme D.E. look - paid for it)
(bought Grapes of Wrath 90 ) post 4 50 to be sent to paid 94 50 Mlle. Kloucowski see order book
subsc Horizon 6 mos 60 frs paid Dec 16
Renewed Jan 1st 1940 6 mos A & B to July 1st 300 by cheque
(Feb 13 Harrap Eng-Fr Dicty (PE ) on a/c 675 paid Ap. 26 1940 400 left over 275

div.head: 1939. VII TEISSIER to: jan. 1st. 1940
div.note: 2 sub. B.
sold to Beg July 3 30v (S B owes Mme T)
July 4 returned 30v for To Beg sold July 3 1/2 price)
div.ab: 11 Harlequin House (Sept 13 her mother returned) july 12
div.note: Aug 1 Aydelotte: Elizabethan Rogues & Vagabonds 110 (sent from Oxford Press) paid Oct. 23rd. 1939

div.ab: May 3 Elizabethan Plays & Players. returned May 11
div.note: subsc to Horizon expires with June No 65fr wrote May 16 to ask 6 mos not renewing Horizon

div.head: 1940 TEISSIER subsc to July 1 1940 May 30 received letter from Hotel Beauséjour, Biarritz is to stay there a month - wants books
